name: Akumu: Nightmare
description:
Finally, after more than a month, I can announce that the game "Akumu: Nightmare" episode 1 DEMO is now available for download via the link below!

There are many scenes that are lacking in this build, due to lack of assets for the game (I can't draw and my PC is not that good to render lots of 3D scenes). But there has been progress that can be seen in build version 0.01 this time.

The GUI still bad, but I will update it in the future!

Changes :

- Available for both PC and Android versions (iOS and Mac not yet available)

- More than 70 existing dialogues

- 2 choices that determine different results (applies to the next update as well)

- 1 game over route

- 2 bonus images (if you can complete the route correctly)

- Spoiler for the next update

Plans:

- Create a "missing scene" in the game

- Create 3D scenes and assets

- Create new story routes

- Create an achievement system and gallery

- Hire people to create original drawings
